oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Russ Hanson interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hanson, Russ; Minser, William
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hanson, Russ; Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Captain Russell Hanson served as an Artillery officer in the U.S. Army during the Vietnam War. The interview was conducted by Billy Minser on January 22, 2020 at the Blount County Public Library.
